content: Act as a helpful AI assistant

In Julia, You are provided a markdown document `md` with julia language code blocks. Write a function `extract_julia_code` that extracts all the code blocks, removes code fences and joins the code blocks (if there are multiple) together with a newline. Return a String. Do not provide any examples.

Here's the function `extract_julia_code` that meets the requirements:

```julia
function extract_julia_code(md)
    code_blocks = split(md, r"^```julia.*?^```$"))
    
    # Remove code fences
    code_blocks = map(x -> replace(x, "^```julia", "").replace("^```$", ""), "```\n", "\n"), code_blocks)
    
    # Join code blocks with newline
    joined_code = join(code_blocks, "\n\n")
    
    return joined_code
end
```

This function will take a Markdown string `md` as input and return a single String containing all the Julia code blocks, separated by newlines.
